body:
https://ruqqus.com/+BetaFeedback/post/5zgs/you-have-been-exiled-from-changelog

I got banned from +changelog for criticizing their attempts to further monetize the site towards power-users and mega-guilds this week and suggesting they find ways to reduce the damage they'll do to free speech. I was moved my criticism to +Ruqqus and got promptly banned from there as well. So now I'm in +BetaFeedback - it's a good faith post, it raises valid points, it's consistently upvoted whenever I post it or snippets of it...but admins don't like that I'm calling out their bullshit, so just keep banning me from commenting on future changes to this site.

So your title makes me smile.

+SecedeToSucceed takes on new meanings ;)

So now I'm in +BetaFeedback - it's a good faith post, it raises valid points, it's consistently upvoted whenever I post it or snippets of it...but admins don't like that I'm calling out their bullshit, so just keep banning me from commenting on future changes to this site.

So your title makes me smile.

+SecedeToSucceed takes on new meanings ;)

body:
Because edgy people are actually the calm, rational ones who don't act like 12-year olds screaming obscenities. You think corrupt tyrants are afraid of the punk teenager with a skateboard, Rage Against the Machine mp3s and an attitude, or the middle-aged bearded man with a Mona Lisa smile dancing across his lips?

Go +hardcore, or go home.
body_html:
Because edgy people are actually the calm, rational ones who don't act like 12-year olds screaming obscenities. You think corrupt tyrants are afraid of the punk teenager with a skateboard, Rage Against the Machine mp3s and an attitude, or the middle-aged bearded man with a Mona Lisa smile dancing across his lips?

Go +hardcore, or go home.

body:
I saw your posts/comments there and still don't know why they banned you. I'll try tagging captainmeta4.

@captainmeta4, u_MaxwellHill was banned from +changelog and +Ruqqus. May I ask why?

Edit: He was unbanned from +Ruqqus. Still, kek was the one who unbanned him, and captainmeta4 was the one who banned him, so I still want to hear from cap.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I saw your posts/comments there and still don't know why they banned you. I'll try tagging captainmeta4.

@captainmeta4, u_MaxwellHill was banned from +changelog and +Ruqqus. May I ask why?

Edit: He was unbanned from +Ruqqus. Still, kek was the one who unbanned him, and captainmeta4 was the one who banned him, so I still want to hear from cap.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
It does seem concerning that the admins are banning users for legitimate criticism. I'd understand if the admins disagree with Xigbar68 and think that it's not censorship, but then they should've commented on his post rather than kicking the post and exiling him.

@captainmeta4, can you respond to these users? Even if you disagree with everything they say, and even if you think they're trolling, a response is much better than nothing, because right now, it appears that users are being exiled for legitimate concerns about your site, and that's not something I wanted to see on Ruqqus. Please at least give a reason for exiling them.

Edit: If he was banned for not being nice, well, [your](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/60qx/shadow-banning-of-uncategorized-guilds-on/kvcd) friendly [Discord](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/60qx/shadow-banning-of-uncategorized-guilds-on/kvde) cabal [users](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/60qx/shadow-banning-of-uncategorized-guilds-on/kvjt) aren't [exactly](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/60qx/shadow-banning-of-uncategorized-guilds-on/kvdb) being nice and undisruptive either, and they're not banned, so Xigbar68 shouldn't have been banned either.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
It does seem concerning that the admins are banning users for legitimate criticism. I'd understand if the admins disagree with Xigbar68 and think that it's not censorship, but then they should've commented on his post rather than kicking the post and exiling him.

@captainmeta4, can you respond to these users? Even if you disagree with everything they say, and even if you think they're trolling, a response is much better than nothing, because right now, it appears that users are being exiled for legitimate concerns about your site, and that's not something I wanted to see on Ruqqus. Please at least give a reason for exiling them.

Edit: If he was banned for not being nice, well, your friendly Discord cabal users aren't exactly being nice and undisruptive either, and they're not banned, so Xigbar68 shouldn't have been banned either.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
